body: There's so much potential in mind control females, I really expect more from artists. This one is lacking, not really that different although it was "mind control". Also, fendom is interesting because it illustrates the opposite of our reality, it's something most based on pure imagination.
Femdom fucking sucks. I blacklisted it for a reason. If I was in that bitch, I’d commit necrophilia so fucking graphic, it would be banned on Hoodsite.
